last_updated.description: Timestamp of the most recent TWAP data update. Contracts querying the price data are recommended to check this value and determine if the data is too old to be considered valid.

price.description: Price of the asset averaged over the last two TWAP data updates

Decimal.description:
A fixed-point decimal value with 18 fractional digits, i.e. Decimal(1_000_000_000_000_000_000) == 1.0

The greatest possible value that can be represented is 340282366920938463463.374607431768211455 (which is (2^128 - 1) / 10^18)
